name: Starexcess (itch)
description:
Escape from a tyrant government and save the planet Shambala. Be the resistance! Starexcess is a retro-looking vertical shoot 'em up inspired by the 16-bit era. Take on enemy armies and dodge frenetic shots in this shoot 'em up for one or two players in a local ofline co-op.

Features:

  • Each ship has two weapons, main and secondary, which can be alternated. But beware, changing weapons influences your speed!
  • Supports 1 or 2 players (local - offline coop). Play side by side, like old days.
  • Different ships with different weapons, health and speed. Choose the one that suits you best.
  • Seven levels with waves of enemies randomly chosen. The waves will not appear in the same order as previous games, encouraging the development of player skill.
  • Pixel art style. Drawn pixel by pixel.


    Controls:

    -Player 1

    move: ASDW
    shot: J
    bomb: K
    mode: L

    select option: K (only the player one can select the options)

    speed up the text: J (only the player one can speed up the text)
    cut the text screen: Esc/ENTER/START (only the player one can cut the text)
    start the level: Enter/Esc/START (only the player one can start the level)

    Start/Pause: Esc/Enter
    Quit the level: Press Backspace/Back during the PAUSE on levels

    -Player 2 (Press START/NUM7 in the second control on ship select screen to select the second player)

    move: UP DOWN LEFT RIGHT
    shot: NUM1
    bomb: NUM2
    mode: NUM3

    Start/Pause: NUM7
